events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking page hasn't updated in several days, so I'm concerned about the delay.
System identified issue cluster based on keywords such as delay and tracking indicating a delivery delay problem.
The support case was assigned to the logistics support team to handle the delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order hasn’t arrived yet, and I’m here to help you track and resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address to help me check the current status with the courier?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 456 Pine Street, Springfield.
I contacted the shipping provider and found your package is delayed due to a transit hub backlog. It should be delivered within the next 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I’m a bit concerned about the delay but appreciate your efforts to look into it.
We will monitor the delivery and notify you if there are further issues, but your package should arrive shortly as per the latest information.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, my order arrived yesterday. Thank you very much for your help and quick responses.
The support case has been closed following successful delivery and customer confirmation of receipt.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation was sent to collect feedback on the support experience.
